hadiths.text: Abu Tha’labah al-khushani said that he asked the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ):We live in the neighbourhood of the People of the Book and they cook in their pots(the flesh of) swine and drink wine in their vessels. The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said: If you find any other pots, then eat in them and drink. But if you do not find any others, then wash them with water and eat and drink (In them)

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَكْلِ فِي آنِيَةِ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding using the vessel of the people of the book
